Home.title: Barloworld Mongolia LLC
Home.description: Mongolia has faced some challenging times but the economy and our company’s outlook are turning a corner with commodity prices on the upswing.  The long-term fundamentals remain strong and serve as positive indicators that bode well for great opportunities for Barloworld Mongolia LLC and our employees in the years to come. In order to seize this opportunity, Mongolia must not only develop its mining industry but also expand its infrastructure as it strives to develop a balanced economy for the benefit of all its citizens. The Barloworld Mongolia LLC has for many years supplied the equipment, people and technology to help these key sectors of the economy to grow. The key to our success is our people, whose skill and dedication to working together to advance the country is inspiring. We support them by providing an intellectually challenging working environment that is conducive to their professional development.
Home.to_be_the_best: To be the best Cat dealer, period.
Home.superior_services: Superior Services. Lasting Relationships. Stronger Communities.
Home.barloworld_mongolia: Barloworld Mongolia is committed to honesty, integrity, respect, safety, high quality, and positive attitude.
Home.do_you_need_equipment: Do you need equipment that delivers outstanding performance at your job site? Contact us today to learn more about us and our new, used and rental equipment as well as our parts and service.
Home.connect_your_email: If you want to receive the latest information, please enter your email address.

About.on_behalf: On behalf of the management and staff of Barloworld Mongolia LLC, I would like to take this opportunity to welcome you to our website. Our mission is to deliver highest quality solutions to every customer and to help these key sectors of the economy to grow.
About.health_insurance: Health insurance (including family), Free lunch and transportation, Normal working hours (07:30-16:00, Monday-Friday),A safe, fair, friendly working environment.
About.we_carry: We carry an entire line of brand new Cat ® machines built to stand up to the most rugged environments. Our Cat product line of more than 300 machines shows that we’re committed to being an industry leader that supplies durable and reliable equipment. From telehandlers to skid steer loaders and backhoes, we carry a variety of equipment types with different dimensions, capabilities and features. We work hard to understand exactly what you need so we can help you find the perfect machine for greater efficiency and cost savings.
About.some_companies: Some companies know they need certain heavy equipment at their job site, but they don’t have the capital to purchase a new machine outright. Barloworld Machinery offers high-quality used equipment that will give you excellent value and stretch your purchasing dollar. Whether you need an on-highway truck, a rock crusher or a generator, we’re here to match you to the perfect solution. We also offer preventive maintenance plans, so we can deliver reliable service and keep your equipment working like it’s supposed to.
About.if_you_want_to: If you want to try a machine before you buy, only need equipment for a short time or just aren’t ready to purchase new or used equipment, we can help. We have a huge selection of rental equipment and products that offer a flexible and cost-effective solution. You won’t have to worry about owning and operating costs, and you can increase productivity with quality equipment solutions. Our rental fleet includes everything from hydraulic excavators to articulated trucks and a range of compact and heavy equipment. In addition to our selection of both Cat® and Allied manufactured machines, we also offer an extensive inventory of rental power systems and site support equipment ranging from backup and primary generator sets, temperature control and air compressors to lift trucks, aerial work platforms and work tool attachments.
About.service_support: With 24/7 parts and service support – including full-service branches equipped with the most up-to-date diagnostic and repair equipment, factory-trained technicians, and the area’s largest fleet of field service trucks – Barloworld Machinery can be your total equipment solutions provider. You need available parts at all times to keep your heavy equipment running. Fortunately, we supply new parts through all of our facilities — as well as Barloworld Exchange components — for the days when avoiding downtime is critical. You can also purchase used, unused and reconditioned items if the cost is a factor. Trust us to provide high-quality and reliable parts that will keep your equipment running and help you save money on costly downtime. At some point, every machine needs service. Whether it’s field service, preventive maintenance or hydraulic repairs, you need a company you trust to deliver required services at the right times. Barloworld Machinery has a fleet of more than 50 field service vehicles as well as more than 200 trained service professionals ready to provide product support for your equipment from Caterpillar. Whenever you purchase new or used equipment or rent from us, we’ll develop a product support strategy with you to handle everything from changing the oil to a total machine rebuild.
About.do_you_need_equipment: Do you need equipment that delivers outstanding performance at your job site? Contact us today to learn more about us and our new, used and rental equipment as well as our parts and service
